ygData.subject: RE: How do I make sewing kits...
ygData.msgSnippet: I heard that player made backpacks sell for 50 pp on most servers from the message boards. I ve never seen them for sale though... Elyrie (Druid on Cazic
ygData.messageBody:
I heard that player made backpacks sell for 50 pp on most servers from the
message boards. I've never seen them for sale though...

Elyrie (Druid on Cazic Thule)

Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] How do I make sewing kits...
